items.sentence: Tom went to Boston and stayed there until he died.
Tom went to the drugstore to buy some cough syrup.
Tom will have plenty of time to do that next week.
Tom will leave the company at the end of the year.
Let\'s list all the reasons we shouldn\'t do that.
Let\'s talk quietly so we don\'t wake the baby up.
Tom says we can park on either side of the street.
Tom skipped dinner saying he was too tired to eat.
Tom thinks women in America wear too much perfume.
Tom turned on the small lamp on his bedside table.
